A Weekend of Art in San Francisco

16 Dec 2014

Last October I spent 10 days in San Francisco, my friends at THE ISSUEÂ magazine were kind enough to publish my art review of a weekend in the city. Featuring the most interesting museums and the new exhibition @large from Ai Weiwei in Alcatraz, you can read it in their blog.

Ai Weiwei @large

Saigon, Minessota by Eric Fischl – 1985

Roy Lichenstein, Painting with Statue of Liberty, 1983

Views from the Tower in Der Young are worth a go!
